resources.string:
AMon supports the investigation project MDSM developed by NESG. 

AMon will gather non-sensitive information from your device to mobile devices security. 

All the information will be sent to a remote server for future study.

AMon will gather non-sensitive data from your device to support the investigation project MDSM. More information related to the gathered data can be found in https://mdsm1.ugr.es/static/en/gathered_data.html. AMon will be running in background after its activation and won\'t disturb the user experience.
AMon has been disabled, likely by using another VPN based app
AMon uses a local VPN to register internet traffic. For this reason, please allow a VPN connection in the next dialog.
AMon could not start automatically. This is likely because of a bug in your Android version.
Android refused to start the VPN service at this moment. This is likely because of a bug in your Android version.
If you cannot press OK in the next dialog, another (screen dimming) app is likely manipulating the screen.

For consistent results, the Android battery optimizations should be disabled. 

In the next dialog, select "All apps" at the top, tap on AMon in the list and select and confirm "Don't optimize\ 

Some additional changes could be needed for some models. Follow the in-app instructions if you experience an unexpected crash".
For consistent results, the Android data saving options should be disabled for AMon \n\nIn the next dialog, enable the options \"Background data\" and \"Unrestricted data usage\"
Please describe the problem and indicate the time of the problem:
VPN connection cancelled\nDid you configure another VPN to be an always-on VPN?
Powering down your device with AMon enabled, will automatically start AMon on powering up your device
Another VPN is set as Always-on VPN
Turn off Block connections without VPN in Android VPN settings to use AMon in filtering mode
Turn off \"Private DNS\" in Android network settings to use AMon in filtering mode
Open the Recent screen (also known as Recent Apps or Recent Task List). Then, lock AMon swiping or long pressing on it and pressing the lock icon. (This last step can vary between Android versions)
Allow AMon to ignore batttert optimizations.
To switch AMon state, click on the logo.
All the battery saving changes have been done.
AMon is running in the background.

Disabling battery optimization is needed for AMon to perform correctly. 

Follow the proposed steps in the next screen to disable battery optimization. 

This menu can be accessed later by the menu shown in the main screen.
